0100010110011110 0100000010000110 0 -> sum: 1000011000100100, cout: 0
0010100010010011 0011110011111110 0 -> sum: 0110010110010001, cout: 0

1101001110010100 1011101111011011 0 -> sum: 1000111101101111, cout: 1
0101000101110001 0111100011010011 0 -> sum: 1100101001000100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
